turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Jane, I'm going to need to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which Starbucks would you like me to place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets do the Starbucks on 1374 Center Drive in Medford, Oregon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, will do. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do a Vanilla Bean coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that blended or served hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do a blended drink this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size would you like? Tall, Grande, Or Venti sized?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I need a size Venti today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Vanilla Bean comes with whip cream by default. Is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't want any whip cream on my drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will remove that option then. Are there any other options you'd like done to your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask them to make it with almond milk instead of regular?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will make sure it has almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please also make sure it has no flax seeds in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, will that be all for this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, I've placed an order for a Venti sized Vanilla Bean ice blended drink with no whip cream, almond milk, and no flax seeds.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Don't forget, your order is placed at the Starbucks on 1374 Center Drive, Medford Oregon. Your drink should be available for pickup shortly, and your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much Jane, that will be all, goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Goodbye
